Checked shirt in cotton poplin with a button-down collar and classic front. Open chest pocket, short sleeves, yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
